abstract: Supreme Court announces it will disclose after-the-fact changes to its opinions, common practice that has attracted much criticism; also agrees to remove non-working hyperlinks on court's website.
lead_paragraph: Though changes in opinions after they are issued are common, the court will now clearly identify those revisions on the court’s website.

headline.main: Supreme Court Plans to Highlight Revisions in Its Opinions
headline.print_headline: Court Plans to Highlight Revisions in Its Opinions

snippet: Though changes in opinions after they are issued are common, the court will now clearly identify those revisions on the court’s website.
